name: BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.writeValue
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.writeValue() method sets the value property to the bytes contained in an ArrayBuffer and returns a Promise.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

TheBluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.writeValue()method sets the value property to the bytes contained in an ArrayBuffer and returns a Promise.
